import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default function Cakes({ Cake }) { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (

{Cake.name}

Price: {Cake.prices * quantity} Rs/-

Quantity

{Cake.name}

{Cake.description}
); }
